articles.title: Power Ministry rejected REC proposal of selling PFC's stake to PGCIL: Union power minister RK Singh - Economic Times
articles.description: Power Grids market capitalisation had fallen about Rs 33,000 crore in the last two trading sessions following reports of the proposal. Shares of PGCIL closed at Rs 201.25, down 0.67%, on the BSE on Monday after hitting 52-week low of Rs 175.10 intraday.
articles.content:
The government has rejected power financier REC Ltds proposal of its takeover by the Power Grid Corp of India (PGCIL), power and new and renewable energy minister RK Singh told ET on Monday.

articles.description: Apple Inc (AAPL.O) said on Monday it will manufacture its latest iPhone 14 in India, as the tech giant moves some of its production away from China.
